author: delaere
body:
This PR removes three outdated classes: L1TkCluster, L1TkStub, L1TkTrack. Theses classes are superseeded by TT\* classes. 

After discussing with Louise, we agreed to clean them to ease the development of new features.
The code in SLHCUpgradeSimulations/L1TrackTrigger that uses these classes hasn't been touched for several years. These are old versions of what now lives in L1Trigger/TrackTrigger, so we think it is safe to remove it.

The modified code was tested with runTheMatrix.py --what upgrade -l 10800 and runTheMatrix.py --what upgrade -l 12200. Let's hope it was not picking deleted files from the release area.

@boudoul, @skinnari, FYI.
title: L1 tkclasses cleaning
